TECHNICAL_INFO.Summary: Shirpa Muthu is an experienced Instructional Designer and Learning Strategist with a strong background in project management and eLearning development. She has successfully led training initiatives that enhance performance and operational efficiency, utilizing data-driven approaches and UX design principles. With a passion for accessibility and continuous improvement, Shirpa is adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful learning solutions.
